name: Botivo Alcohol Free Aperitif (GF)
description: Botivo is a small batch, aperitif inspired drink that infuses 5 bittersweet, herbal and citrus botanicals into a fermented apple base for several weeks to extract the subtle flavours and natural complexities. It is then balanced out with wildflower honey. To be enjoyed in what we call the ‘yellow hour’, the most important moment of the day when you clock out and ease into your evening. Serve with soda as a spritz and sip over ice with a juicy wedge of orange. This is a real Positive Drinks Co favourite.

name: Holly GoLightly Alcohol Free Cider (0.5%abv.) (VG) (GF)
description: Winner of a Great Taste Award 2019 and Silver Medallist at the British Bottlers Institute Awards 2019, Holly is our favourite cider – refreshingly light at just 0.5% ABV yet full of character. Don’t be fooled by the low alcohol label: she has plenty of body, a gentle touch of acidity on the finish, and that wonderful tannin aftertaste that only 100% pressed cider apples can deliver. This is a full-flavoured medium cider with deep roots in our range – fruity, authentic, and refreshingly moreish. Carefully blended to provide the true taste of real cider apples, Holly proves that low alcohol doesn’t mean low enjoyment.

name: Oddbird Spumante
description: Sweden´s first and only sparkling wine liberated from alcohol. Our Spumante has its origin in the Italian province of Treviso located in Veneto, known as the prosecco region. The Spumante is made with traditional prosecco methods with larger bubbles and 100% Glera, exclusively delivered from prestigious DOC- and DOCG vineyards, creating fresh tones of Nashi pear, green apples and grapefruit. The Spumante is matured for 12 months before being gently liberated from alcohol.

name: Gift Voucher
description: This is a digital gift card, nothing will be physically posted to the recipient. We get it. We stock a lot of truly awesome products and so much choice can make decisions tricky. We got you. Give the gift of delicious drinks for people who like delicious drinks. Whether it's a birthday, promotion, new baby, end of the week, or just because you love someone, Positive Drinks Co gift cards are available in all sorts of denominations and redeemable for the tastiest drinks.

name: Brisca - Ready to drink non-alc cocktail (made using Botivo)(GF)
description: Brisca is Positive Drinks Co's first foray into producing our own delicious drink for people who love delicious drinks. We've taken one of our fav non-alcs, Botivo, and mixed it up in style with cherry, apricot, popcorn and a touch of bitters, to create something we think is super tasty. It's bright, it's citrusy, it's fresh and it's just the right level of sweet. Pour it over ice and serve it with a wedge of lime or top with soda for some extra fizz. Delicious! Each bottle contains four serves and was made by the legends over at Silver Circle Distillery.

name: PULP apple cider (0.5%abv.) (VG) (GF)
description: All pulp, no fiction! Holly Go Lightly is one of our top selling ciders. So when the producers told us they had another on offer, we ordered it by the case. Is it as good? Damn straight! It's got everything you want from cider, it's crisp and refreshing with plenty of body and a sweet aroma.

name: Wednesday’s Domaine - Alcohol Free Cuvée (VG + GF)
description: One for the party people, Cuvée's beautiful pink effervescence and crisp acidity lifts any occasion. For the Positive Drinks Co team, this is the standout sparkling. It's bright and bubbly and crisp, perfect for summer sipping or celebrations.

name: Wednesday’s Domaine - Alcohol Free Vignette (VG + GF)
description: One to be enjoyed with a meal, Vignette enjoys a complexity that culminates in a long, dry finish. Expect overtures of dark plums and damson, with shades of spice and forest floor. A fuller bodied non-alc wine that drinks a bit like a Cahors, ideal for a sunday roast or with a sticky toffee pudding.
duplicateWith: Wednesday’s Domaine - Alcohol Free Cuvée (VG + GF)

name: Folkington's Light Tonic Water - (150ml can) (GF) 8-pack
description: Folkington's indian Tonic Water is made from a blend of natural quinine with citrus and floral botanical extracts made in small batches.Tasting Notes: Sparkling mixer with bitterness from quinine and bitter orange.

name: Wednesday’s Domaine - Alcohol Free Eclat (VG + GF)
description: Eclat showcases zip, zing and everything you need to celebrate life's important moments, big or small. A terrific non-alc fizz for any occasion, Eclat won't leave anyone feeling like they're missing out on a toast.
duplicateWith: Wednesday’s Domaine - Alcohol Free Cuvée (VG + GF)

name: Wild Idol - Sparkling White (VG + GF)
description: Extremely bright, fresh, and naturally alcohol-free wine, WILD IDOL Sparkling White has a beautiful pale straw hue and is bursting with zesty green apples and aromas of white peach and honeyed melon, finished with soft, fine bubbles. Vegan, gluten-free and low calorie, it is hand-crafted using wine-making techniques with a blend of fragrant Müller-Thurgau grapes, for an authentic non-alcoholic wine alternative. This is a real Positive Drinks Co favourite, especially for celebrations.

name: Wednesday’s Domaine - Alcohol Free Piquant (VG + GF)
description: Beginning with a beautiful Airen Blanco from the historic La Mancha region of Central Spain, these wines are gently de-alcoholised before being blended with a handful of natural ingredients that lift body, flavour, aroma and length in the absence of alcohol. Piquant is one of the staples of the Wednesday's Domaine stable and it's easy to see why. It's delicate and drinkable without being overly sweet or thin.
duplicateWith: Wednesday’s Domaine - Alcohol Free Eclat (VG + GF)

name: Folkington's English Garden Tonic Water - (150ml can) (GF) 8-pack
description: Folkington's English Garden Tonic Water is made from natural quinine blended with rosemary, cucumber and mint extracts made in small batches.Tasting Notes: Sparkling mixer with bitterness from quinine blended with the tastes of cucumber, rosemary and mint.

name: Crossip - Dandy Smoke (VG + GF)
description: The Crossip folks describe this as 'meaty and smoky' and they aren't wrong. A bold opener of sweet smoky lapsang and top notes of pine. The body comes through with a deep fruit, cinnamon and clove. Finishing with spice notes of ginger, chilli and nutmeg. Serve this up as a non-alc cuba libre with cola and a squeeze of lime.

name: Feragaia - Alcohol Free Spirit (VG + GF)
description: Made from 14 land & sea botanicals that were carefully identified for their flavour profiles and wild earth properties. Its refreshing depth of flavour is a layered journey through wild earth. From the land, the freshness of lemon verbena and blackcurrant leaf brings with it a resilience for the ‘always on’ modern age. From the sea, nutrient rich Sugar Kelp gives body and breadth whilst promoting inner renewal. And finally, a long finish from spiced botanicals like pink peppercorn, brings a sense of grounding and calm. To make an epic Paloma, stir down with pink grapefruit juice and sea salt then top with tonic and a wheel of pink grapefruit.

name: Crossip - Fresh Citrus, Tonic and Seasn
description: Fresh Citrus A non-alcoholic spirit with a complex and bright fusion of citrus, herb and spice. Perfect for a 0% Mojito, Cosmo or simply with Tonic. FRESH CITRUS opens with top notes of mandarin and eucalyptus. The body evolves into a multiplex of citrus; orange, lemon and grapefruit. The finishing notes are of fiery ginger and a subtle bitterness. The Tonic Folkington's indian Tonic Water is made from a blend of natural quinine with citrus and floral botanical extracts made in small batches. Tasting Notes: Sparkling mixer with bitterness from quinine and bitter orange. Seasn Seasn is the salt & pepper for drinks— a pair of delicious & intense non-alcoholic cocktail bitters that make everything taste better. Just add three dashes to transform your favourite drinks.

name: Crossip - Fresh Citrus and Tonic
description: Fresh Citrus A non-alcoholic spirit with a complex and bright fusion of citrus, herb and spice. Perfect for a 0% Mojito, Cosmo or simply with Tonic. FRESH CITRUS opens with top notes of mandarin and eucalyptus. The body evolves into a multiplex of citrus; orange, lemon and grapefruit. The finishing notes are of fiery ginger and a subtle bitterness. The Tonic Folkington's indian Tonic Water is made from a blend of natural quinine with citrus and floral botanical extracts made in small batches. Tasting Notes: Sparkling mixer with bitterness from quinine and bitter orange.

name: Crossip - Pure Hibiscus, Tonic and Seasn
description: Pure Hibiscus Crossip Pure is a non-alcoholic alternative to Italian bitters like Campari or Aperol. It makes for a refreshing Spritz and great to use as the base of classic Negroni. Pure opens with light florals of hibiscus and eucalyptus, its body builds with notes of pine, clove and cubeb pepper with a long, intense finish. The Tonic Folkington's indian Tonic Water is made from a blend of natural quinine with citrus and floral botanical extracts made in small batches. Tasting Notes: Sparkling mixer with bitterness from quinine and bitter orange. Seasn Seasn is the salt & pepper for drinks— a pair of delicious & intense non-alcoholic cocktail bitters that make everything taste better. Just add three dashes to transform your favourite drinks.

name: Crossip - Pure Hibiscus and Tonic
description: Pure Hibiscus Crossip Pure is a non-alcoholic alternative to Italian bitters like Campari or Aperol. It makes for a refreshing Spritz and great to use as the base of classic Negroni. Pure opens with light florals of hibiscus and eucalyptus, its body builds with notes of pine, clove and cubeb pepper with a long, intense finish. The Tonic Folkington's indian Tonic Water is made from a blend of natural quinine with citrus and floral botanical extracts made in small batches. Tasting Notes: Sparkling mixer with bitterness from quinine and bitter orange.
